name: Novotel Rockford Darling Harbour

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have had an excellent stay at the Novotel Rockford. It is located at the end of Darling Harbour, simply walk out the main door, turn right, and you are then at the end of Darling Harbour area right next to the Chinese Gardens. Although there are major streets around the hotel there are no streets you have to cross to get to Darling Harbour, which is a real bonus.
reviews.title: Close to Darling Harbour- near the Chinese Gardens

reviews.text: Also a real plus is that the monorail has a terminal just over the road in China town (see photos) so if you want to go to town and are foot sore it is so easy to catch the monorail (we bought a day pass which was good fun as it does a complete circuit and one comes along every 3-5 minutes...so very convenient!!). The monorail also goes to Darling Harbour (the loop only goes one way- from China town onto Sydney centre and then onto to Darling Harbour).
reviews.title: Above Average

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We decided to prolong our holiday after our cruise by spending 2 days and a night in Sydney. Not knowing Sydney at all, after much searching online we found this hotel at $169 for the night including breakfast.
reviews.title: Great place

reviews.text: Check in was officially 2pm, but when we arrived at just after 11am we were told our room was ready. We were quite tired, so it was a big relief to know we didn’t have to wander the streets looking for a place to nap! The gentleman checking us in was efficient and so polite.
reviews.title: Great Value & Location

reviews.text: The room was a fantastic size – and the bathroom was great. There was a temperature and light control panel inside the front door that was incredibly easy to use. We switched the lights on from that panel and then when it was time for bed just turned off the lamps above the bed.
reviews.title: nothing to dislike

reviews.text: I liked the Rockford for two major reasons. The staff was great and helped out even doing a rush job on cleaning a stained shirt. The second reason was being on the far end of the park from the harbor, very quiet and a nice walk to the harbor. The Pumphouse bar is connected to the end of the hotel, nice place for sure. The only downside was the internet access was a little expensive, something like $6.00 for 30 minutes. In the USA most hotels offer free internet access. Great acces to shops and Chinatown is just a few blocks away with some good markets, food etc.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel.

likes.liked: — Clean and the staff was very good

reviews.text: I stayed here for a rewards night I was attending at the Star City Casino and loved the hotel. The only downside was the noise from the nightclub downstairs.
reviews.title: Superb Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I've stayed in a few places at Darling Harbour/Haymarket but this hotel was the nicest, the bed was huge, nice views over Chinatown Gardens, close to everything. You can walk to the markets and market city, chinatown, Darling harbour and everywhere! The light rail stop is right outside and you can walk to Central Station.
reviews.title: Great location for seeing Sydney sites

likes.liked: — The location was hard to beat
likes.disliked: — The noisy hotel room doors when being closed early in the morning!

reviews.text: Check-in was a breeze and i'd definetly stay again.
reviews.title: great stay and a excellent location

likes.disliked: — breakfast is a little on the pricy side

reviews.text: My husband and I regularly stay in Sydney on weekends away, usually prefering to stay in five star hotels on the waterfront. However, given that this time we were going to spend more time out of the hotel than in it, we decided to try the Novotel Rockford. We were not disappointed. Although only what I would class a basic three and a half to four star hotel (when you are used to the luxury with all the mod cons), you can't beat it for the price offered.
reviews.title: Just normal!

aka: Novotel Rockford Darling Harbour Hotel Sydney
description: Novotel Rockford Darling Harbour is ideally located in vibrant Darling Harbour within easy walking distance of the city centre of Sydney. Perfect for business trips, holidays and city breaks, the hotel is adjacent to the Sydney Entertainment Centre and the Sydney Convention and Exhibition Centre. Guests can enjoy a drink or delicious meal in our renowned heritage listed Pumphouse Bar and Restaurant. Other features include meeting facilities, a heated indoor lap pool and a gym. Close to all the excitement and attractions Sydney has to offer.
